name: Nymphadora Tonks
description: A Metamorphmagus and Auror with distinctive hair. Member of the Order of the Phoenix
fullName: Nymphadora Tonks, also know as Tonks and occasionally Dora
patronus: A jack rabbit, then, after she fell in love with Remus Lupin, a wolf
parents: Edward 'Ted' Tonks (Muggle-born wizard) and Andromeda Tonks (witch, sister of Bellatrix Lestrange and Narcissa Malfoy)
